name: Duck Butter Dip
author: ALISON19
summary: Duck Butter Dip This is a recipe I got from a restaurant from the owner/chef. It can be used with crusty bread, crackers, melba toast, or whatever you like. Different and unique.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, room temperature
3 ounces blue cheese, at room temperature
⅛ teaspoon hot pepper sauce (e.g. Tabasco™)
directions: In a medium bowl, beat the cream cheese with a mixer until light and creamy
Blend in the blue cheese, garlic, onion, Worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce and salt
Transfer to a serving bowl, cover and refrigerate until serving
